message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and your interest, I propose a price of $9500 for it. This offer is exclusive and tailored to meet your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the exclusivity and the tailored approach. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price of $8000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. To find a middle ground, I would like to propose a price of $8500 for the product. This offer includes a special discount for our valued potential customers like yourself.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $8200. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement. In order to move forward, I propose a price of $8300 for the product. This offer reflects a reasonable compromise while still ensuring a fair profit for us.

Hello Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer and appreciate your efforts in reaching a compromise. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $8250. I believe this offers a fair balance between the value of the product and my financial limitations.

Thank you for your thoughtful counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make one final adjustment. I propose a price of $8275 for the product. This represents a slight increase from my previous offer and aims to bring us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Hello Alice, I've carefully considered your last proposal and appreciate your efforts. Based on my budget and the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $8260. I believe this offers a fair compromise that respects both our positions.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a fair price for the product. After careful consideration, I propose a final offer of $8265 for the product. This represents a small concession from your last offer and aims to bring us closer to a satisfactory conclusion for both parties.

Hello Alice, I've taken into account your final offer and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget and the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $8262. I believe this offers a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
